page.title: 13RADIO AND TELEVISION
page.content: The area is very well served by radio and television. Most people can receive {BBC1, BBC2 }and {Channel 4} television programmes. The local independent television station is { {Granada,}broadcasting from studios in central Manchester. Many enterprising people can install an extra aerial to receive programmes from North Wales, { {S4C}(Welsh Channel 4) and {Harlech {Television.} The local official radio stations are{ {BBC Radio Manchester }and {Piccadilly {Radio}(commercial). Some 'pirate' stations operate, such as KFM, broadcasting from Stockport, though this is often raided and closed down by the police.
